@graph.headline: Vegan Meatball Sub
@graph.keywords: can you freeze vegan meatballs,how to make vegan meatballs,how to make vegan meatballs from scratch,vegan meatball sandwich,vegan meatball sub,vegan meatball sub recipe,vegan meatballs,vegan meatballs without soy,vegetarian meatball sub

@graph.name: Vegan Meatball Sub
@graph.description: If you're a sandwich fan like me, you will LOVE this vegan meatball sub.  It's super easy to make, 100 % plant-based, and sooo delicious!!
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2  cups cooked kidney beans ((or one 15 oz can))
1 teaspoon soy sauce ((omit for a soy-free version) )
3  Italian sub rolls or one large baguette

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse and drain the kidney beans. Put them in a medium bowl and mash them well with a fork. In a medium pan, heat some oil and sauté the onions for 3 minutes. Add the minced garlic and the mushrooms and cook for another 2 minutes. Add it to the mashed beans together with the spices, tomato paste, soy sauce, and oats. Put the sunflower seeds in a food processor and pulse until a fine meal is achieved. Add to the bean mixture and combine well. Season with salt and pepper. Form about 12-14 vegan meatballs.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse and drain the kidney beans. Put them in a medium bowl and mash them well with a fork. In a medium pan, heat some oil and sauté the onions for 3 minutes. Add the minced garlic and the mushrooms and cook for another 2 minutes. Add it to the mashed beans together with the spices, tomato paste, soy sauce, and oats. Put the sunflower seeds in a food processor and pulse until a fine meal is achieved. Add to the bean mixture and combine well. Season with salt and pepper. Form about 12-14 vegan meatballs.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, equally place the meatballs on top of it, and bake them for about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, equally place the meatballs on top of it, and bake them for about 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the vegan meatballs on Italian sub rolls or baguette and top them with your favorite marinara, vegan cashew Parmesan, and sprinkle them with fresh parsley. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the vegan meatballs on Italian sub rolls or baguette and top them with your favorite marinara, vegan cashew Parmesan, and sprinkle them with fresh parsley. Enjoy!
